name: Karşıyaka Taraftar Fan Token
description: ""Kaf Sin Kaf"" is the old language pronunciation of the letters KSK. Colors are green-red. Karşıyaka Sports Club is one of the three clubs that have the right to carry a star and crescent in their emblem. Kaf Sin Kaf is replaced by Kaf Kaf for short today . Although the club is most famous with football, it has reached the championships of Turkey in athletics , basketball , handball , sailing and swimming sports.
